If successful: [Shaken](/statusEffectsDeadfireShaken/) for 15.0 sec {{!}} [Accuracy](/accuracy/) vs. [Will](/will/) | label_1 = Penetration | data_1 = 7 | rel_quests = | rel_abilities = | rel_items = | rel_characters = | internalname = HolyRadiance | guid = 383d76f5-e6ae-4fb0-be09-224d74c57548 }} '''{{Pagename nd}}''' is an [ability](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireAbilities/) in {{poe2}}. ## Description {{Description|{{#var:description}}}} ## Effects {{#var:effects_formatted}} ## Notes * Holy Radiance's burn damage-over-time and healing scales with how well the priest's [Disposition](/disposition/) aligns with the preferred behaviour of their faith, (see [Priest](/priestDeity/)). The favoured and opposed dispositions are shown in-game by hovering over the dispositions in the Reputations tab of the Character Sheet. ** This value is called the "deity multiplier". See [disposition](/dispositionBonusMultiplier/) for more info. ** The bonus for both damage and healing starts at a base of 5, and is multiplied by the deity multiplier. The bonus damage can be seen by hovering over the damage in the inspect window, and is shown as "+5 Skaen" (for example). * Friendly AoE does not apply to any allied Spirits or Vessels. * The foe AoE only applies to Vessels.
